data.title: Rhapsody In Blue – a timeless American classic
data.description: On Feb 12, 1924, a concert organised by popular jazz band leader Paul Whiteman was held at the Aeolian Hall in New York City. Despite the cold and snow, the show was jam-packed not only with music fans but also composers like Sergei Rachmaninov and John Philip Souza and popular actors like Gertrude Lawrence.

data.title: Colombian-French artist David Rodriguez brings cultural fusion to Bangkok
data.description: The beauty of cultural fusion is portrayed through art during "Bailemos", which is running at the Art Exhibition Space, 5th floor of Siam Discovery, Rama I Road, until Sunday.

data.title: Unicef marks Children's Day with a new campaign
data.description: To mark World Children

data.title: Follow Jungkook's journey in new documentary
data.description: As Korean heartthrob Jungkook is serving in the military, Disney+ Hotstar will premiere a new three-part docuseries titled The Original on Dec 3, allowing fans to follow his growth from being a member of BTS to becoming an acclaimed solo artist.

data.title: A gathering of ghosts
data.description: Among Thai ghosts, the top three legends -- Mae Nak, Phee Pob and Phee Krasue -- have frequently featured in films and television series. According to Creative Economy Agency (CEA), Mae Nak has appeared in over 40 films and TV series while Phee Pob has made over 30 appearances in films and TV series.

data.title: Famous Thai voiceover team to wrap up its iconic career next year
data.description: Phantamit, known for dubbing big-screen hits like “The Storm Riders” and “Shaolin Soccer”, set to wrap up its 30-plus years in the Thai entertainment industry during Songkran

data.title: Legal avenue regarding land dispute at Khao Kradong proposed
data.description: Key document in effect acknowledges that the land belongs to the SRT and is a public asset, lawyer says

data.title: Thai Airways launches debt-to-equity conversion as part of rehab plan
data.description: SEC gives the airline a go-ahead to get creditors to convert existing debt into equity, marking a huge step towards THAI exiting rehab

data.title: NHSO unveils first ‘Care Box’ in Bangkok to improve healthcare access
data.description: The kiosk connects patients with doctors to provide treatment for 42 common illnesses, helping residents save time and effort by eliminating the need to visit hospitals or clinics

data.title: Dredging of Ping River discussed to counter flooding in Chiang Mai
data.description: Local agencies in Chiang Mai province on Monday discussed a dredging operation in the Ping River in a bid to address flooding in the long term.

data.title: Digital Economy Ministry targets online scams
data.description: ‘DE-fence’ platform designed to protect citizens from fraudulent calls and SMS text messages

data.title: Thai tuna industry commits to sustainable fishing, local sourcing
data.description: MoU underscores dedication to supporting local fishermen and adhering to international sustainability standards

data.title: Thai economy shows resilience in Q3, positive outlook for 2024-2025
data.description: In the third quarter, several key economic drivers significantly contributed to growth, NESDC says

data.title: Thailand increases flights to tackle New Year ticket price rise
data.description: Six airlines collaborating to provide additional 247 flights that will offer 73,388 extra seats

data.title: Cabinet may not set up Joint Technical Committee with Cambodia yet
data.description: Timing likely unworkable because of other commitments, defence minister says

data.title: Pichai to take BOI team to Shanghai roadshow to woo investors
data.description: The BOI delegation will also hold a special forum for Chinese investors to explore opportunities in Thailand’s growing industries

data.title: Bangkok Film Festival wraps with awards for world cinema wonders
data.description: Thailand’s answer to Cannes declared a roaring success as international film extravaganza boosts the country’s soft-power push

data.title: UNIQLO x ANYA HINDMARCH | The Nation in Brief
data.description: Winter just got a lot more exciting with a collaboration that's as stylish as it is playful. Introducing UNIQLO x ANYA HINDMARCH, the Winter 2024 Collection that will ignite your wardrobe with curiosity and creativity.

data.title: Curvistan Bangkok is the ultimate haven for Porsche lovers
data.description: Celebrating the spirit of the global Porsche community in the heart of South-East Asia, Curvistan Bangkok is the ultimate haven for Porsche lovers and anyone with a love for sleek design and spirited community vibes.

data.title: Ex-senator’s 3rd plea: Return 924 rai in Pathum Thani to temple
data.description: Despite three open letters from the former senator, no action has been taken to revoke the ownership of Alpine Golf Club and Ratchathani housing estate

data.title: MASTER claims title as Southeast Asia's leading cosmetic surgery provider partners with Indonesia's “Lumeo Health”
data.description: Master Style PCL ("MASTER") is setting its sights on becoming Southeast Asia's leading hub for cosmetic surgery, with a new partnership with Indonesia's Lumeo Health.

data.title: Thai industry taps Japan for clean energy, soil recycling technology
data.description: Industrial Estate Authority team tours leading Japanese companies for lessons in transitioning to circular economy

data.title: Thaksin positions Pheu Thai as conservative rival to People’s Party
data.description: Patriarch of ruling party condemns People’s Party stance on amending the lese majeste law during campaign for Udon Thani election.

data.title: Thai Media Fund vows continued training for film industry’s workforce
data.description: Fund tells seminar it goes beyond offering financial assistance to media producers and content creators

data.title: India’s ‘Seven Sister States’ ripe for investment
data.description: Thai-Indian Business Council points to the many advantages its ‘high-end market’ offers to investors, especially in the country’s Northeast

data.title: Downpours forecast for Southern Thailand
data.description: Thai Meteorological Department confirm country will not be affected Typhoon Man-Yi which is currently heading towards Hainan

data.title: All that jazz: Royal compositions to be celebrated at upcoming concert
data.description: The Nation Group pays tribute to the late King Bhumibol Adulyadej the Great with next month’s “HM Blues” concert in Bangkok

data.title: US, China and India trade imbalances an opportunity for Thailand
data.description: With India’s population now surpassing that of China, Thailand must do more to capitalise on bilateral trade opportunities

data.title: Act now to drive sustainability and meet climate goals and government mandates
data.description: The floods in northern Thailand in 2024 had a widespread and crippling effect, impacting 8.6 million rai of land and causing an estimated economic loss of between THB 30 to 40 billion.

data.title: Cryptocurrency markets post-election: A new era in global finance
data.description: The surge of Bitcoin to a new all-time high surpassing $88,000 following the U.S. primary elections marks more than just market optimism – it signals a fundamental transformation in the global financial system.

data.title: BSRC, GISTDA, and Zoo Organization unite to boost biodiversity via geotech
data.description: Bangchak Sriracha Public Company Limited (BSRC) has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Geo-Informatics and Space Technology Development Agency (GISTDA) and the Zoological Park Organization under The Royal Patronage of H.M. The King.

data.title: Revolutionising education with AI
data.description: AI, the buzzword du jour, evokes a range of perceptions, from intimidation due to its potential to "steal our jobs", to inspiration from its vast opportunities. In a world where technology is advancing at an unprecedented pace, AI has permeated various aspects of our lives, particularly for Gen Alpha (born around 2010) who grew up with technology as close friends.

data.title: Curing loneliness
data.description: Studies have shown that loneliness and isolation can have a negative health impact, comparable to risks associated with smoking up to 15 cigarettes or drinking six glasses of alcohol per day.

data.title: Trumpet star Ibrahim Maalouf to perform in Bangkok
data.description: Twice Grammy-nominated trumpet superstar Ibrahim Maalouf will perform live in Bangkok for the first time at Lido Connect, Rama I Road, on Nov 26 at 7.30pm.
